Not A Bot

  • Developed a bot for GroupMe which responds to keywords and supports functions such as calculating group message statistics and simulating users using Markov chains
    • NotABot on Github

Coin Bot

  • Developed a bot for Coinbase that periodically monitors prices for crytocurrencies. It currently supports selling your holdings for a minimum profit percentage
    • CoinBot on Github

Bug In The Code

  • Creating Drum & Bass Mixes under the alias 'Bug In The Code'
